sentences.en: MANCIA : Well , no question that rennin inhibitors are a new class of agents, promising agents.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 肾素抑制剂确实是一种新药, 一种很有前景的药物.

sentences.en: Rennin activity ( RA ) and proteolytic activity ( PA ) of pepsin rennin and rennet were studied.
sentences.cn: 本文研究了胃蛋白酶、凝乳 酶 与自制皱胃酶的凝乳活力与蛋白分解活力.

sentences.en: Result: CQT can decrease the blood pressure, rennin and angiotensinexpression in plasma of RHR.
sentences.cn: 结果: 复方七芍降压片能降低RHR血压 和血浆肾素、血管紧张素的水平.

words.tran_cn: 高血压蛋白原酶；[生化]凝乳酶

trans.tran_en: an enzyme that occurs in gastric juice and is a constituent of rennet
